sentence: The image is a screenshot of a webpage from airmileshops.ca displaying a promotional section for earning AIR MILES.
sentence_cn: 该图片是 airmileshops.ca 网页的截图，其中显示了赚取 AIR MILES 的促销部分。

sentence: - The top of the page features the airmileshops.ca logo and a banner inviting users to sign in to earn miles on purchases.
sentence_cn: - 页面顶部显示 airmileshops.ca 徽标和横幅，邀请用户登录以在购物时赚取里程。

sentence: There is a login placeholder for entering a collector number.
sentence_cn: 有一个用于输入收集员号码的登录占位符。

sentence: - Beneath the header, there's a navigation menu with options like Home, How It Works, Store Directory, Offers, Shopping Tool, and Back to School.
sentence_cn: - 标题下方有一个导航菜单，其中包含“主页”、“工作原理”、“商店目录”、“优惠”、“购物工具”和“返回学校”等选项。

sentence: - The main area features a purple-themed banner with the text "Back to Shopping," highlighting an offer for 5 times the miles on style products.
sentence_cn: - 主要区域采用紫色主题横幅，上面写着“重返购物”，重点介绍购买时尚产品可获得 5 倍里程的优惠。

sentence: It is valid from August 25 to September 7.
- It promotes exclusive AIR MILES reward miles available from 32 participating partners, showcasing logos of companies such as Anthropologie, Old Navy, Sephora, and Roots.
sentence_cn: - 它宣传 32 个参与合作伙伴提供的独家 AIR MILES 奖励里程，并展示 Anthropologie、Old Navy、Sephora 和 Roots 等公司的标志。

sentence: - Next to the promotional banner, there is a "Browse Directory" section listing various categories like Apparel, Books, Music & Videos, Electronics, Flowers & Gifts, Health & Beauty, Home & Outdoors, Travel & Accommodations, and Baby, Kids & Toys.
sentence_cn: - 在促销横幅旁边，有一个“浏览目录”部分，列出了服装、书籍、音乐和视频、电子产品、鲜花和礼品、健康和美容、家居和户外、旅游和住宿以及婴儿、儿童和玩具等各种类别。

sentence: - There is a section with tabs for different offers including 5x Event, Back to School, and links to stores like Hotels.com, The Body Shop, Keurig, and more.
sentence_cn: - 有一个部分包含不同优惠的标签，包括 5x 活动、返校以及 Hotels.com、The Body Shop、Keurig 等商店的链接。

sentence: - The lower half of the image lists logos of popular stores such as Sears, Indigo, Dell, eBay, Amazon.ca, Lands' End, Victoria's Secret, Toys R Us, Expedia.ca, Old Navy, GAP, Bose, Hotels.com, Banana Republic, and others.
sentence_cn: - 图片的下半部分列出了热门商店的标志，例如 Sears、Indigo、Dell、eBay、Amazon.ca、Lands' End、Victoria's Secret、Toys R Us、Expedia.ca、Old Navy、GAP、Bose、Hotels.com、Banana Republic 等。

sentence: The overall theme is promotional, aiming to encourage users to shop online through these partners to earn additional AIR MILES.
sentence_cn: 总体主题是促销，旨在鼓励用户通过这些合作伙伴在线购物以赚取额外的 AIR MILES。
